message_rewards.100:
😳 Wow {nick}! You sent 100 messages in the server!
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.200:
🎖️ Congratulations {nick}! You sent 200 messages in the server!
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.300:
Congratulations on 300 messages! Here's a cupcake 🧁
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.400:
Wow, 400 messages, {nick}! Keep the convo going!!
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.600:
You made it to 600 messages, {nick}! Don't stop.
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.900:
Everyone make sure to congratulate {nick} on sending 900 messages! 🙌
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.1200:
how embarrassing! you can’t shut up! wear the badge with both pride and shame for sending 1,200 messages.
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.1400:
Only 1,400 messages, {nick}? Those are rookie numbers, keep going!
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.1600:
1,600 messages {nick}? Don't your hands hurt from texting so much?
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.1800:
Congrats on 1,800 messages, {nick}! You should probably go outside now...
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.2200:
Hey, {nick}, 2,200 messages! You're making @Infinite_Bed run out of reward messages!   Don't stop, of course
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.2400:
Thanks for keeping me employed with your 2,400 messages, {nick}!
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.2600:
{nick} ur fingers wont grow biceps so why try???
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.3200:
{nick} you should spend time talking to the Lord instead of this...
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.3400:
{nick} five big booms for 3,400 messages!
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM.
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.3800:
{nick} u have a lot of opinions”
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.4200:
{nick} whether you spammed or are chronically on your phone, you get a reward for 4,200 messages:”
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.4400:
{nick} SHUT UP! no one in the chat cares that you said”
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.4600:
{nick} i hope both sides of your pillow are cold because you deserve it for reaching 4,600 messages”
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.4800:
{nick} Hey, it could be worse! You could be at 4,800 messages! Oh wait... you are...
"*{message}*"
message_rewards.5200:
5200 messages, {nick}? Aren't you, like, in class or something?
"*{message}*"
